mapper.update: update gift_commodity set gift_id = #{gift_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_id = #{commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_commodity_num = #{gift_commodity_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_commodity_out_status = #{gift_commodity_out_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_commodity_return_status = #{gift_commodity_return_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_num_id = #{commodity_num_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_commodity_sample = #{gift_commodity_sample,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_commodity_remark = #{gift_commodity_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where gift_commodity_id = #{gift_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gift_commodity_id, gift_id, commodity_id, gift_commodity_num, gift_commodity_out_status, gift_commodity_return_status, commodity_num_id, gift_commodity_sample, gift_commodity_remark from gift_commodity where gift_commodity_id = #{gift_commodity_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select gift_commodity_id, gift_id, commodity_id, gift_commodity_num, gift_commodity_out_status, gift_commodity_return_status, commodity_num_id, gift_commodity_sample, gift_commodity_remark from gift_commodity
